title: Language Competency Enhancement Course Utilizing Blended Lab-Based Collaborative Learning and Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Job-related foundational language skills and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to enhance practical language skills and digital collaboration through scenario-based teamwork. Blended learning environment utilizing STB-LAB and Gather Town platforms in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners execute collaborative projects with peers using gamification elements in hybrid laboratory settings at least three times
Learners perform virtual-physical laboratory tasks with over 80% accuracy using STB-LAB and Gather Town tools
Learners achieve over 20% improvement in language collaboration skills (communication, problem-solving, feedback provision) through project-based assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
